verses.verse: כְּרָפְאִ֣י <WH7495> When I would have healed לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel וְנִגְלָ֞ה <WH1540> was discovered עֲוֹ֤ן <WH5771> then the iniquity אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> of Ephraim וְרָע֣וֹת <WH7451> and the wickedness שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria כִּ֥י <WH3588> for פָעֲל֖וּ <WH6466> for they commit שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> falsehood וְגַנָּ֣ב <WH1590> and the thief יָב֔וֹא <WH935> cometh in פָּשַׁ֥ט <WH6584> of robbers spoileth גְּד֖וּד <WH1416> [and] the troop בַּחֽוּץ׃ <WH2351> without

וּבַל־ <WH1077> not יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they consider לִלְבָבָ֔ם <WH3824> not in their hearts כָּל־ <WH3605> all רָעָתָ֖ם <WH7451> all their wickedness זָכָ֑רְתִּי <WH2142> [that] I remember עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now סְבָב֣וּם <WH5437> have beset them about מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4611> now their own doings נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> are before פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> they are before my face הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become
בְּרָעָתָ֖ם <WH7451> with their wickedness יְשַׂמְּחוּ־ <WH8055> glad מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> They make the king וּבְכַחֲשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH3585> with their lies שָׂרִֽים׃ <WH8269> and the princes

כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> are all מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <WH5003> They [are] all adulterers כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> Like תַנּ֔וּר <WH8574> as an oven בֹּעֵ֖רָה <WH1197> heated מֵֽאֹפֶ֑ה <WH644> by the baker יִשְׁבּ֣וֹת <WH7673> [who] ceaseth מֵעִ֔יר <WH5782> from raising מִלּ֥וּשׁ <WH3888> after he hath kneaded בָּצֵ֖ק <WH1217> the dough עַד־ <WH5704> until חֻמְצָתֽוֹ׃ <WH2556> until it be leavened

י֣וֹם <WH3117> In the day מַלְכֵּ֔נוּ <WH4428> of our king הֶחֱל֥וּ <WH2470> have made [him] sick שָׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> the princes חֲמַ֣ת <WH2573> bottle מִיָּ֑יִן <WH3196> of wine מָשַׁ֥ךְ <WH4900> he stretched out יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand אֶת־ <WH854> with לֹצְצִֽים׃ <WH3945> with scorners

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> they קֵרְב֧וּ <WH7126> For they have made ready כַתַּנּ֛וּר <WH8574> like an oven לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> their heart בְּאָרְבָּ֑ם <WH693> whiles they lie in wait כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> all the night יָשֵׁ֣ן <WH3462> grow old אֹֽפֵהֶ֔ם <WH644> their baker בֹּ֕קֶר <WH1242> in the morning ה֥וּא <WH1931> it בֹעֵ֖ר <WH1197> it burneth כְּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> fire לֶהָבָֽה׃ <WH3852> as a flaming

כֻּלָּ֤ם <WH3605> All יֵחַ֙מּוּ֙ <WH2552> They are all hot כַּתַּנּ֔וּר <WH8574> as an oven וְאָכְל֖וּ <WH398> and have devoured אֶת־ <WH853> שֹֽׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8199> their judges כָּל־ <WH3605> All מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4428> all their kings נָפָ֔לוּ <WH5307> are fallen אֵין־ <WH369> None קֹרֵ֥א <WH7121> [there is] none among them that calleth בָהֶ֖ם אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

אֶפְרַ֕יִם <WH669> Ephraim בָּעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> himself among the people ה֣וּא <WH1931> himself יִתְבּוֹלָ֑ל <WH1101> he hath mixed אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> Ephraim הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has become עֻגָ֖ה <WH5692> is a cake בְּלִ֥י <WH1097> not הֲפוּכָֽה׃ <WH2015> not turned

אָכְל֤וּ <WH398> have devoured זָרִים֙ <WH2114> Strangers כֹּח֔וֹ <WH3581> his strength וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יָדָ֑ע <WH3045> and he knoweth גַּם־ <WH1571> also שֵׂיבָה֙ <WH7872> [it] not yea gray hairs זָ֣רְקָה <WH2236> are here and there בּ֔וֹ וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יָדָֽע׃ <WH3045> upon him yet he knoweth

וְעָנָ֥ה <WH6030> testifieth גְאֽוֹן־ <WH1347> And the pride יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> to his face וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor שָׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> and they do not return אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor בִקְשֻׁ֖הוּ <WH1245> nor seek בְּכָל־ <WH3605> for all זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> has become אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim כְּיוֹנָ֥ה <WH3123> dove פוֹתָ֖ה <WH6601> also is like a silly אֵ֣ין <WH369> without לֵ֑ב <WH3820> without heart מִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4714> to Egypt קָרָ֖אוּ <WH7121> they call אַשּׁ֥וּר <WH804> to Assyria הָלָֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> they go

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they יֵלֵ֗כוּ <WH1980> go אֶפְר֤וֹשׂ <WH6566> I will spread עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> over רִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH7568> my net כְּע֥וֹף <WH5775> as the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the heaven אֽוֹרִידֵ֑ם <WH3381> upon them I will bring them down אַיְסִרֵ֕ם <WH3256> I will chastise כְּשֵׁ֖מַע <WH8088> hath heard לַעֲדָתָֽם׃ <WH5712> them as their congregation ס

א֤וֹי <WH188> Woe לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> like כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָדְד֣וּ <WH5074> unto them for they have fled מִמֶּ֔נִּי <WH4480> at שֹׁ֥ד <WH7701> from me destruction לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פָ֣שְׁעוּ <WH6586> unto them because they have transgressed בִ֑י וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> would אֶפְדֵּ֔ם <WH6299> against me though I have redeemed וְהֵ֕מָּה <WH1992> they דִּבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> them yet they have spoken עָלַ֖י <WH5921> against כְּזָבִֽים׃ <WH3577> lies

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not זָעֲק֤וּ <WH2199> And they have not cried אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me בְּלִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> unto me with their heart כִּ֥י <WH3588> When יְיֵלִ֖ילוּ <WH3213> when they howled עַל־ <WH5921> the sake מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָ֑ם <WH4904> upon their beds עַל־ <WH5921> the sake דָּגָ֧ן <WH1715> themselves for corn וְתִיר֛וֹשׁ <WH8492> and wine יִתְגּוֹרָ֖רוּ <WH1481> they assemble יָס֥וּרוּ <WH5493> [and] they rebel בִֽי׃

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יִסַּ֔רְתִּי <WH3256> Though I have bound חִזַּ֖קְתִּי <WH2388> [and] strengthened זְרֽוֹעֹתָ֑ם <WH2220> their arms וְאֵלַ֖י <WH413> against יְחַשְּׁבוּ־ <WH2803> yet do they imagine רָֽע׃ <WH7451> mischief

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ ׀ <WH7725> They return לֹ֣א <WH3808> not עָ֗ל <WH5920> [but] not to the most High הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become כְּקֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> bow רְמִיָּ֔ה <WH7423> they are like a deceitful יִפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> shall fall בַחֶ֛רֶב <WH2719> by the sword שָׂרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8269> their princes מִזַּ֣עַם <WH2195> for the rage לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <WH3956> of their tongue ז֥וֹ <WH2097> this לַעְגָּ֖ם <WH3933> [shall be] their derision בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt
